name: CatWISE_W1lt16p5
flux_or_mag_cut: Same as baseline; 66 matches to 2MRS z<0.02 removed (paper notes negligible change)
notes: Not listed as separate 'a' row in Table 1; included here for convenience as change is negligible.
z_notes: From Dam et al. 2022/2023 CatWISE quasar sample: mean z≈1.2; 99% z>0.1; 61% z>1 (selection differs slightly).

name: LoTSS_DR2
survey: LoTSS-DR2 (NB estimator, direction fixed to CMB; Smin=5 mJy)
flux_or_mag_cut: Smin = 5 mJy (Table III); direction fixed to CMB ('CMB' row)
reference: Böhme et al. 2025 (arXiv:2509.16732v1; PRL), Tables II–III
notes: LoTSS-DR2 'Free' direction estimates are flagged as problematic in the paper; we therefore use the 'CMB' constrained estimator (Table III), which fixes the dipole direction to the CMB dipole and estimates only the amplitude. To avoid accidentally overweighting a fixed direction in Protocol D, RA/Dec uncertainties are set large (90°) so this tracer contributes mainly via amplitude.
z_notes: Wide redshift distribution; not needed for Protocol D fit. | Shared radio z_mean=1 assumed (Protocol D-BAO v0 sensitivity scaffold).

name: NVSS
survey: NVSS (NB estimator, Free direction; Smin=20 mJy)
flux_or_mag_cut: Smin = 20 mJy (Table III); galactic mask and standard cuts as in paper
reference: Böhme et al. 2025 (arXiv:2509.16732v1; PRL), Tables II–III
notes: Using the negative-binomial (NB) estimator values for NVSS with a free dipole direction (Table III). For variant=2MRS_clean we keep identical numbers because this pack uses published summary estimates rather than catalog-level re-matching.
z_notes: Wide redshift distribution; not needed for Protocol D fit. | Shared radio z_mean=1 assumed (Protocol D-BAO v0 sensitivity scaffold).

name: CatWISE_W1lt16p5
flux_or_mag_cut: W1 < 16.5 (≈0.078 mJy); |b|≥30°; plus Secrest et al. masks; ecliptic-latitude trend modelled
notes: x and α from Sec. 3.3; Table 1 includes ε=(9.2±0.4)×10^-4 for ecliptic-latitude trend.
z_notes: From Dam et al. 2022/2023 CatWISE quasar sample: mean z≈1.2; 99% z>0.1; 61% z>1 (selection differs slightly).

name: Quaia_G<20.0_pmSig_lt2_0p6_1p0
reference: Zenodo Quaia bundle (Secrest/CatWISE-related); user-provided FITS + random_10x; dipole remeasured locally
notes: Debiased by random_10x; sigma_mag combines mask-scan amplitude std + shot proxy sqrt(3/N); sigma_dir=max separation across |b|≥20/25/30 after cuts.
z_notes: z_mean from Quaia redshift_quaia within bin; used by BAO harness.
